# Government of Canada - Tender Announcement
### Invocation to Tender: Construction of New Government of Canada Building in Stellarton, NS

**Reference Number:** cb-124-95497681
**Solicitation Number:** M4000-4-1986
**Publication Date:** October 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 24, 2023, 1:00 PM ADT

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites tenders for the construction of a new Government of Canada building in Stellarton, Nova Scotia. The successful bidder will be required to complete the work within 24 months from the date of contract award.

This tender is part of a two-phase selection process. Bidders must respond to each phase separately. The first phase requires bidders to submit a qualifying bid that meets the mandatory security requirements outlined in the attached tender document.

The second phase involves submitting a bid with the lowest price that also meets all mandatory requirements. The responsive bidder with the lowest price will be recommended for contract award.

**Bid Submission Instructions:**

* Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Refer to the attached tender documents for further information

**Tender Documents:**

* Invitation to Tender document
* Security requirements
* Phase Two documentation

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Canada will post all amendments, including significant enquiries received and their replies, using the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS).

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is subject to Canada's Trade Agreements, including the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Indigenous Procurement:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender. A profile in the Federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) can increase your company's visibility and provide additional business opportunities.

**Contact Information:**

* Sandra Bremner
* sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* (902) 717-5395
